unnormalised: Are your Instagram Reels reaching only your didi's neighbours? Is your carefully curated content lost in the algorithmic abyss? Fear not, aspiring influencer! The buzz in the social media circles is all about diving deep into follower analytics.
normalised: Are your Instagram Reels reaching only your didi's neighbors? Is your carefully curated content lost in the algorithmic abyss? Fear not, aspiring influencer! The buzz in the social media circles is all about diving deep into follower analytics.

unnormalised: Think of it as your personal kundali for content! Tools are now available that allow you to dissect your audience demographic, see what time of day your Chennai-based followers are most active (hint: probably not 03:00 hrs!), and identify which type of posts resonate most with your Delhi and Mumbai crowd.
normalised: Think of it as your personal kundali for content! Tools are now available that allow you to dissect your audience demographic, see what time of day your Chennai-based followers are most active (hint: probably not three zero zero hours!), and identify which type of posts resonate most with your Delhi and Mumbai crowd.

unnormalised: Several homegrown platforms are even offering features specifically tailored to understand the nuances of the Indian market. Understanding which hashtag is trending during Diwali (October 2024, perhaps?) vs. Eid can make all the difference.
normalised: Several homegrown platforms are even offering features specifically tailored to understand the nuances of the Indian market. Understanding which hashtag is trending during Diwali (October two thousand and twenty four, perhaps?) versus Eid can make all the difference.

unnormalised: Imagine crafting that perfect chai-related post, timed perfectly for the 16:00 hrs tea break in Kolkata, all thanks to your insightful follower data! It's not just about vanity metrics anymore; it's about building a genuine connection. Check out the latest workshops at IIM Bangalore on 27/07/2024 to learn more! Forget blindly throwing content at the wall; let's get data-driven, yaar!
